reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress perfect for formal occasions, with an amazing fit that's comfortable and flatters their curves. The built-in shapewear works well, with one customer noting it hugs everything perfectly. The material quality receives mixed feedback - while some praise its stunning appearance, others find it looks and feels cheap. The shapewear's effectiveness is also mixed, with some saying it holds in the right places while others find it too clingy. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy the dress
items.body: Cute dress! So flattering. I am 5'0" and the length was great, i even wore flats with it but was orginally planning on wearing heels and would have looked great. The quality of the color was great and it didnt look or feel cheap. The shapewear was not too tight but hugged in the right places. Would reccommend. I recieved many compliments on this dress. Read more
items.author: Marissa Monte

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yes! This is a great dress
items.body: Beautiful dress and the shapewear is so flattering. It’s also comfortable which isn’t usually how shapewear works. I got the purple color and it’s elegant. I’m wearing it to a red carpet premiere and pairing it with the right accessories to dazzle it up a bit. Read more
items.author: Cristal P

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: First, this dress fit amazingly. I got a size large. I am 5'7 and 169lbs. The built in Spanx cinched me in and smoothed out any bulges. The cut of the dress was flattering. With the built in Spanx you don't need a bra or panties and the dress has a opening in the crotch for easy bathroom access. The material is lightweight and stretchy. I had concerns about the material being so thin but in pictures you cannot even tell. Overall a very nice dress. However, the material snags very easily and the built in bra didn't give me the fullness in my chest like I would have if wearing my own bra. The cups of the built in bra also felt lower set in the dress which led to a lack of lift in the chest area. So I did wear a strapless bra with the dress to correct this. Read more
items.author: Natalie A. Nieto

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Shapewear built in!
items.body: Very flattering and forgiving on the curves with thick fabric and great support. This wonderful dress has a built in shelf bra, shapewear from waistline to mid thigh, as well as ruching on one side of the waist. I wore a strapless bra but most could easily skip one as it has good support. The sleeves are versatile and I opted to use the spaghetti straps for additional support, positioning the capped sleeves up. For a different occasion it would be fun to wear fully off the shoulder. The shapewear has a split crotch for using the restroom but I did not attempt this maneuver. Hand washed (per recommendations), steamed smooth and ready to wear again. Large fit me perfectly with no alternations, 5'9" 140 lbs and busty. Getting softer around the middle as I age (50+) and this dress was still flattering. Read more
items.author: bright847

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Looks like it’s from SHEIN…so cheap looking!
items.body: Not sure if it’s just the color (which I loved in the photo but is not great in real life), but this dress looks like a costume. It looks like a $20 dress from SHEIN. For almost $140 with tax, it’s absurd. It’s basically swimsuit material. It also has random marks and spots and I can’t tell if they are factory damage or if the material is genuinely supposed to look this weird. The built in shapewear is a joke, it has almost no compression. I’m a curvy size 8 and this makes me look much larger, but if I had sized up it would have been baggy. I have a relatively small waist but this made me look like I have all kinds of lumps and bumps. It’s also kind of short for me which was unexpected because I’m only 5’7”, but it doesn’t even hit my ankle. OH, and the slit goes really high which is fine in theory but in actuality has you flashing an awkward amount of sheer green fake underwear with an opening in the center that’s miserably under the dress. Bought for a wedding guest dress but it’s unwearable. I am confused as to why people love this dress. Returning it. Read more
items.author: Danielle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely Comfortable
items.body: Absolutely BEAUTIFUL!! Extremely comfortable to wear & flexible to move in. The built in bra & spandex are a lifesaver. I like to wear panties & with this dress it's impossible. You will definitely see the entire panties across your @$$. Read more
items.author: Debbie

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Low quality, expensive, but beautiful fit.
items.body: The dress looks really pretty on, the built in spanx lining was very slimming and made me feel great. The green color was also quite beautiful. However, the material is very low quality. Even from just trying it on, I noticed little threads visibly fraying all over the dress. And I mean ALL over. The dress is not worth the price. For a + $100 dress, I would expect something that would last longer than one wear. Maybe if the dress were like $50, I’d be more compelled to keep it, and care less about the quality, — but not for $100+. So I returned it. Very very disappointing. The manufacturer really needs to reevaluate the pricing. Buyer be ware!!! Read more
items.author: Alexandria CC

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Only amazing if you are small enough to not need shape wear
items.body: I wanted to love this dress but I did not. The material is stunning and the built in shape-wear is intense in an amazing way, but this dress is not bigger girl friendly I’m 5’5’’, 240lbs, and a normal size 16. According to the size guide I would be an XXL in their sizing so that is what I got. I could get the dress on, but I looked like a busted can of biscuits. The shape wear pulled in extra tight in my waist, almost of the point of hurting, and the straps were extremely tight, meaning I could only wear it as a strapless item. This can be an amazing item, but only if you are small enough to not actually need shape wear to start with. It is too clingy and exaggerated all the wrong parts of my body. Read more
items.author: Cassandra

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Formal Maxi Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Formal Maxi Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Blue, Purple, Black, Champagne, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
